title: Please Please Please Read My Letter!
itunes:title: Please Please Please Read My Letter!
description:
I am writing you a letter all the way from sunny South Africa. Obviously the radio station will not be correct then. Steve after 25 years, I have finally met the man of my dreams and he going to ask me to marry him.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
